body:
Comment 12 by **QQ510371827**: 
I have checked  my system enviroment(e.g, run sfc /scannow command to check whether some
system files lost or modified )and build Go again.
Now TestWinSplitListTestsAreValid passes!! The culprit is mactype(a font Rasterizer
software for Windows and widely used in china,especially chrome users)
https://code.google.com/p/mactype/

Now the latest output is as follows(only one fail remains),
--- FAIL: TestIdentityResponse (0.01 seconds)
        serve_test.go:453: error with Get of http://127.0.0.1:1431/?overwrite=1
 Get http://127.0.0.1:1431/?overwrite=1 EOF
